project.name: Jahia Repackaging of libraries that use the JSP API
project.description: This OSGi bundle is a repackaging of some of the libraries that use the JSP API since we must put a copy of them in a different class loader (inside an OSGi bundle) to make sure they use the JSP API that is packaged in the PAX Web JSP bundle.
